Package pl.project.stages

Class PokerGame

java.lang.Object
pl.project.stages.PokerGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
Stage
public class PokerGame extends Object implements Stage
Represents the main stage of a poker game where players are dealt cards and the game progresses through the initial stages into the auction.

      public void execute(Client client)
